elements.text:
In a meeting with a few colleagues and your boss, your boss calls on you to answer a question. You say your best answer and your coworkers are quiet.

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I'm satisfied with how I phrased my answer.
I was really anxious while I was answering, but was able to manage my feelings.
I'm disappointed in myself because I couldn't say what I wanted to say, but I think my boss understood my point.
I'm glad my boss gave me the opportunity to share my answer.
